name: tiktok-notification-forwarder
description: Production-ready Discord bot to forward TikTok notifications

DISCORD_TOKEN.description: The authentication token for your Discord bot.

OWNER_ID.description: The Discord User ID of the bot owner.

CLIENT_ID.description: The Client ID (Application ID) of your Discord bot.

CONFIG_ENV_URL.description: The URL to the remote configuration file containing additional settings.
